pullrequest.title: Polaris: give min_depth to polaris wheels to improve wheel contact

content.raw: Tested this change in a sequence of motions on a large flat plane with the same friction as the road in task 1.  No significant slipping or spinning occured and driving motions are now repeatable.  Did limited testing in vrc_task_1.  Again, no slipping or spinning was observered when breaks were applied while still on the road.  Drove off the road once and it seemed to behave reasonably.
content.html: Tested this change in a sequence of motions on a large flat plane with the same friction as the road in task 1. No significant slipping or spinning occured and driving motions are now repeatable. Did limited testing in vrc_task_1. Again, no slipping or spinning was observered when breaks were applied while still on the road. Drove off the road once and it seemed to behave reasonably.
